function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"lack of coverage of Water Quality and Availability and Wastewater Management indicators by CASBEE","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne diseases and contamination of water sources","Mitigation":"Incorporate water quality and wastewater management indicators into CASBEE assessments","Technologies":"Water treatment and purification systems, wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Population relying on water sources in the built environment","Owner":"Organizations setting the standards for building assessments"},{"Description":"Incomplete coverage of waste management indicators by CASBEE","Impact":"Risk of uncontrolled waste accumulation and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Include waste management indicators as part of CASBEE criteria and standards","Technologies":"Integrated waste management systems, recycling technologies","People":"Local communities and the environment in the built environment","Owner":"Organizations establishing building assessment guidelines"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of water consumption indicators by CASBEE","Impact":"Risk of water scarcity and inefficient water usage leading to waterborne diseases","Mitigation":"Expand CASBEE criteria to include comprehensive water consumption indicators and efficiency standards","Technologies":"Water-saving technologies, rainwater harvesting systems","People":"Communities relying on water supply in buildings","Owner":"Entities responsible for defining building assessment criteria and standards"}]}
